data.text: Did you know that Deborah Meaden and Douglas Cordeaux (pictured) are celebrating over 250 years of the heritage business Fox Brothers & Co Ltd? And whilst we are giving way incredible facts; did you know that this business is located in Wellington, Somerset? #proud I was fortunate to meet Douglas and have a behind the scenes tour of one of the county's leading heritage businesses. To think that the business is "older than America" is incredible in itself, to be given the opportunity to hold a pattern book dated 1773 was just magical. ðŸŒŸ Fox Brothers are a prestigious clothmaker creating woollen and worsted fabrics for a catalogue of international designers and labels and proudly support the use of British wool. Read all about this exclusive label in the February issue of Somerset Life magazine. ðŸšš Link for home delivery ðŸšš https://lnkd.in/eAUc-Ryn ðŸ“· Graham Trott #foxbrothers #foxbrothersltd #britishwool #designer #loom #wool #Britishfarming #worsted #tweed #williambliss #Wellington #somersetbusiness #somerset #label #designerlabel
